alert.note: Alert for Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 12:50AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Norton County through 115 AM CDT... At 1250 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Almena, or 9 miles northeast of Norton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Norton County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
